info.name: Funnyjunk for Chrome
info.description:
This style makes Funnyjunk look and work way better. A must-have for every Funnyjunk user.
*** Works better with Chrome ***
info.additionalInfo:
VERSION HISTORY

v1.1.1
- Important visual bug fixes

v1.1 [Critical update]
- Fixed a huge visual bug caused by the new markup feature on the comments
- Fixed textfields' appearance all across the site
- Minor visual bug fixes

v1.0.1
- Fixed font issues

v1.0
- Initial release

·
·

FEATURES

+ The thumbnails on the frontpage are now easier to read
+ The userbar on the top is more usable
+ The admin alerts bar is more noticeable
+ The inbox is more readable and less confusing
+ Annoying social buttons are now hidden
+ The important links are more readable (leave a comment, refresh comments, ect.)
+ Previously visited content is dimmed, so you won't visit the same thing twice
+ Redesigned comment section
+ Redesigned alerts box
+ Redesigned status panel
+ Redesigned comment forms
+ Tweaks in content description and tags to make it more usable
